group_1.textRight: ?!@A Magical Girl?

group_1.textLeft: (There she is...)
(Another Magical Girl...@The one with Kyoko Sakura...)
(Well, at least according to my premonition.)
Shizuku...?@But why are you—?

group_1.textRight: It's Yuma...!

group_1.textLeft: Yuma?!@[chara:200601:motion_400]What happened to her?!
(Yuma Chitose...@My most important pawn...)
(Kyoko Sakura...@Her precious savior...)
(I shall task you with the@duty of guiding the savior…)
Oh, hello there!@Are you a Magical Girl from this town?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...@Aren't you?

group_1.textLeft: No.@My territory's in another town.

group_1.textRight: So you're one of them...

group_1.textLeft: "One of them," you say?

group_1.textRight: There've been a lot of you lately...
...Magical Girls from outside Kamihama,@I mean...

group_1.textLeft: (Ah!@[chara:400100:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json]I knew it...)
(...Magical Girls from all over, including@Mitakihara are coming to Kamihama.)
Oh, really?

group_1.textRight: You mean...[chara:300700:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json]you aren't here for@the same reasons as the others?
To hunt all the Witches that are@gathering in Kamihama?

group_1.textLeft: (The Witches gathering...?!)
Witches are gathering here?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it's a recent thing...@There're tons of them in Kamihama...

group_1.textLeft: (So there are lots of Witches and@Magical Girls coming to this town...)
(There is certainly something strange@going on in Kamihama...)
Oh my...
Well that is certainly good to know.
I'll be sure to watch my back.

group_1.textRight: Wait, if you hadn't heard about all@the Witches here, then...why come?
What's the point, if you're @not here to hunt them all?

group_1.textLeft: Actually, I followed another@Magical Girl here.
Though...I lost track of her@after I got here...

group_1.textRight: Another Magical Girl...?@Um, what's she like?

group_1.textLeft: She's still quite young.@Her name is Yuma...

group_1.textRight: Yuma...

group_1.textCenter: Ah shoot, I promised I'd@be back by dinnertime...
Hope she's not bawlin' her eyes@out somewhere...

group_1.textRight: Are you talking about Kyoko's—?

group_1.textLeft: Kyoko?

group_1.textRight: Someone I know...@She's mentioned that name before...

group_1.textLeft: Do you mean...@Kyoko Sakura...?

group_1.textRight: Wait...you know her?

group_1.textLeft: Well come to think of it, Yuma@did mention Kyoko quite often.

group_1.textRight: So, it is the same Yuma...

group_1.textLeft: You said you know Kyoko?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
I...@I should probably tell her about this...

group_1.textLeft: I agree... There are a lot of @Witches in this town, after all.
One wrong turn, and Yuma could@end up in real trouble...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...@Okay, I'll go tell Kyoko...

group_1.textLeft: Good idea...@I'll keep looking for Yuma!

group_1.textCenter: Why would she risk herself willingly?@Feelings are a mysterious thing indeed.
